entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
